name: streamer
title: Streamer
desc: Interviews that explore the future of design and engineering.
article:
Streamer is a focused, one-page podcast template built for creators who want a sleek home for their episodes.


  • Learn more about Streamer
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

All Pages

  • Landing page

(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Accordion section with episodes
  • Transcript modal
  • Light and dark modes
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
